title: Icing on the Lake
description: New Year's Resolutionsby Kirsten (with help from Crystal, Jones, and Emma)1. Survive the month at my sister's house. Survive my 3-yr-old nephew and crazy sister.2. Learn to ice skate better. Or not fall down. Or just get a cuter skating outfit.3. Find hockey-playing, winter-loving hottie. and invite him to the weekend cabin trip (aka "groundhog getaway") with everyone.Oh, sure. No problem.
author: Catherine Clark
